prompt: Design a professional, corporate-style course modules page with a white background and subtle blue-gray accents (#CFD8DC). Include an app bar with 'Data Science 101' in a serif font and a settings icon. Display a horizontal progress bar at 70% completion in deep blue (#1976D2). Present modules in a single-column list of flat cards with module number, title, description, duration, and a circular progress indicator. Use minimal shadows, precise typography, and blue-gray accents for a polished business look.
